imgDesc.text:
This device was the result of early forays into optical science by the Institute of Natural Philosophy while they were still a budding academic organization. Its basic components include <color=#ffe14b>"beam generators"</color> and <color=#ffe14b>"beam receivers."</color>
The beam generator must sometimes be installed on a "beam receiver" base similar to a regulating valve, and can be controlled and rotated through the use of energy from a Xenochromatic Ball Octopus.
